definition: paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: Take this slip to the injection room and give itto the nurse.
sentences.chinese: 把这张纸条拿去注射室交给护士。

sentences.english: They shuffled the pieces on the floor and then dropped them into the shoe.
sentences.chinese: 大家把纸条放在地下搅乱，然后装进了鞋子里。

sentences.english: "Mr. Silver, sir?" I asked, holding out the note.
sentences.chinese: “阁下是西尔弗先生吗？”我问，手里攥着纸条。

sentences.english: With these words, she handed him a piece of paper.
sentences.chinese: 说着这些话，她递过来一张纸条。

sentences.english: Step 4 Collect yourself, or ask a student to collect, the slips of paper.
sentences.chinese: 老师自己收，或者请一名学生把纸条收上来。

sentences.english: We sealed up our windows in winter with slips of paper.
sentences.chinese: 我们在冬天把窗缝用纸条密封起来。

sentences.english: You try to run out of the restaurant before she's finished tne note.
sentences.chinese: 在她看完纸条之前，你试着跑出餐馆。

sentences.english: Sophie quickly found some paper and copied it down longhand .
sentences.chinese: 索菲很快找了一张纸条，用速记法把它抄了下来。

sentences.english: Had a gust of wind come and taken the note and carried it away to God knows where?
sentences.chinese: 难道是刮来一阵风把纸条刮到只有天晓得的地方去了？

sentences.english: Jie can smell the emiction when she write the scrip.
sentences.chinese: 洁回写纸条时，却闻到一股尿臊味。

sentences.english: When shaking the hands, he slipped a note into her hand.
sentences.chinese: 握手时，他把一张纸条塞在她手里。

sentences.english: I want to know who left this note on my desk.
sentences.chinese: 我要知道是谁在我桌上留了这张纸条。

sentences.english: They then tie the paper to bamboo branches on the evening of the Tanabata Festival.
sentences.chinese: 然后他们在七夕的夜晚将纸条绑在竹枝上。

sentences.english: With the notes being read off one by one, the classroom filled up with a radiant atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 随着纸条一张张念下去，教室里荡漾起明媚的气息。

sentences.english: Syme had folded up his strip of paper and stowed it away in his pocket.
sentences.chinese: 这当儿，赛姆叠起他那张纸条，放到口袋里。

sentences.english: I left a 2nd note to aShin when my friend passed away.
sentences.chinese: 在朋友离开的时候，我又留了纸条给阿信。

definition: a piece, scrap or fragment of paper
book/notebook/Japanese-style self-published comic (esp. an erotic one), aka "dōjinshi"/CL:本[ben3]/edition
paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc
